title: Code Samples
content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
  <head>
    <title> Midterm Content </title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="midterm_style.css">
    <script type="text/javascript">
      var input = window.prompt("please enter your name");
      document.write(input);
    </script>
  </head> 
  <body>
    <h1> Hello! </h1>
    <a href="http://www.asu.edu/">ASU homepage</a>
  </body>
</html>
************CSS*********
h1 {
 color: blue;
 text-align: center;
}
